MP Biomedicals is stepping in to support scientists worldwide in understandingSARS-CoV-2 and discovering solutions to combat the disease. We now offer threemonoclonal antibodies from mouse with high affinity to the SARS-CoV-2 spikeproteins for use in various applications, including western blot, immunoprecipitation,ELISA tests, rapid tests and flow cytometry. We have also added to our portfolio fiverecombinant antigens for SARS-CoV-2 diagnostics and research applications.

Rapid 2019-nCoV IgG/IgM Combo Test

Link: https://www.mpbio.com/uk/2019-ncov-igg-igm-combo-test

SKU: 07RDCOV19

Designed for the rapid qualitative determination of IgG and IgM antibodies to 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV, SARS-CoV-2) in human serum, plasma or whole blood.
